remarks: The absolute value of a difference and 'less than or equal to' relation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
statement:
absltd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
absltd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
absltd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
absdifled $p |- ( ph -> ( ( abs ` ( A - B ) ) <_ C <-> ( ( B - C ) <_ A /\ A <_ ( B + C ) ) ) ) $.
